name: 10 Pin Shuffle Tournaments
description:
Bowl for REAL CASH prizes on a bar-room shuffleboard table with 10 Pin Shuffle Tournaments (Skillz Edition) !

One of the most addictive, “pick up and play”, 3D bowling games available in the App Store, this special edition of 10 Pin Shuffle takes competition to another level! Challenge people from around the world with Skillz, a competitive eSports platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, live-streamed events, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing! Play for FREE as long as you like, or raise the stakes and put your skills to the test by playing for CASH. Skillz: eSports for Everyone!

Features:

* Compete for CASH PRIZES or just play for fun using Skillz virtual currency.
* Amazing Retina 3D graphics with shiny chrome shuffleboard weights, shadows and reflections.
* Quick, intuitive controls that are easy to grasp, but challenging to master.
* Real 3D physics engine with accurate bowling pin physics.
* Instant replays of great shots.
* Crowd reactions that reflect your shots as you play.
* iPhone, iPad or iPod touch with full screen support for iPhone X.

Cash tournaments are available in about 75% of the world. Cash tournaments are not enabled in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, FL, LA, MD, MT, SC, SD and TN. If you do not live in a cash-enabled region, you can still play for fun with the Skillz virtual currency.
